EmailTemplate.name: RE: FW: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners (1326984681.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: FW: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners (1326984681.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Vartan,
Thank you for following up with me. I do want to let you know that what MBO does is provide an alternative to self incorporation to independent consultants. We do not provide Accountant/CPA services, we actually help to lower the administrative burden of being an independent consultant by helping with things like contract negotiations, invoicing, payroll etc while providing a corporate structure for you to essentially plug your business into. Also by being an Associate with MBO partners you are protected under our umbrella of professional liability insurances for any contract that you run through MBO Partners.
I have attached a link to a PDF with more information if you are interested in learning further the services we provide.
http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/Welcome_to_MBO_Partners.pdf
Thank you again for your response and if you have any questions in the future please do not hesitate to reach out to me.
Have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: Vartan Chukhadarian [mailto:vchukhadarian@gmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, January 18, 2012 2:25 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: FW: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners
Hi Nicolette,
After careful consideration I've realized and decided that my current Accountant/CPA offers much of the same services.
Thank you, but I'm gonna pass.
Vartan On Wed, Jan 18, 2012 at 11:11 AM, Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> wrote: Hi Vartan,
I hope all is well! I did not hear back from you regarding when a good time for you to speak would be so I have included a link below to my calendar for you to schedule a call at a convenient time for your schedule.
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
Please let me know if you have any questions.
Thank you, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Nicolette Taylor Sent: Wednesday, January 11, 2012 4:04 PM To: 'Vartan Chukhadarian' Subject: RE: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners
Hi Vartan,
Thank you for your response. I will not be available to speak this evening, would there be a convenient time that I could call you tomorrow? Currently the times I have available on my schedule are 10:00am EST or 12:30pm EST would either of those work for you? If not I have a lot of availability on Friday.
Thank you again and have a great evening, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners

Best regards, Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Enrollment Manager MBO Partners
